title: Hero taxi driver locks terror suspect in car before blast outside Liverpool hospital
content:
1. Hero taxi driver locks terror suspect in car before blast outside Liverpool hospital  New York Post
  2. Explosion outside Liverpool hospital was a terrorist incident, UK police say  Fox News
  3. Moment car explodes outside Liverpool Women's Hospital and driver escapes  The Telegraph
  4. Terrorism fears following Liverpool explosion  Washington Examiner
  5. Liverpool explosion: Three arrested under Terrorism Act @BBC News live BBC  BBC
